<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Archives a specific group, preserving its membership at the time of archiving."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/groups/{groupid}/archive"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Archives a specific group, preserving its members at the time of archiving.

**Permissions:**
`Teacher, Admin, SuperAdmin (Consumers)`

**Events:**
`GROUP.ARCHIVE [success, error]`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"Organization ID of the group","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"groupid","in":"path","description":"Unique identifier of the group","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request body for archiving a group (currently not used)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"required":false}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
